<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Path of Iron](/Feats.aspx?ID=6367) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=606" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 206 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=255)

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Martial Artist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6364)

</column>

---

With a burst of effort and speed, you weave a nimble path through your many enemies, striking each in turn as you move past them. You [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=2305); this movement doesn’t trigger reactions. You can attempt a melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) up to three times at any point during your movement, each against a different enemy. Each attack counts toward your [multiple attack penalty](/Rules.aspx?ID=2289), but your multiple attack penalty doesn’t increase until you have made all your attacks.
name: Path of Iron
